meanings.definition: Enlisted: signed up for military service
meanings.sent1: The brave soldier was proud to be an enlisted member of the army.
meanings.sent2: The enlisted recruits were undergoing rigorous training.
meanings.sent3: The enlisted soldiers had to wake up early for their daily drills.
meanings.sent4: Being enlisted in the military was a life-changing decision for him.
meanings.sent5: The enlisted personnel showed great dedication to their duty.

meanings.definition: Enlisted: joined a group or organization
meanings.sent1: She enlisted in the book club to meet new friends.
meanings.sent2: He enlisted in the volunteer program to help the community.
meanings.sent3: The cat enlisted in the mouse-catching squad, but it didn't go as planned.
meanings.sent4: Joining the hiking club felt like being enlisted in a team of adventurers.
meanings.sent5: She enlisted in the choir and found joy in singing with others.
